fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka DevNet 3 tested non-finality for 2 days; network healed successfully
Holesky fork activated; participation dropped initially, recovered after updates applied
Holesky BPO1 scheduled for Monday (October 6-7 UTC)

epbs_development.highlight: ePBS specs stable; blocked on Fusaka stabilization before merging to develop branches
Prism expects to merge on develop next week post-Fusaka stability
Proposal raised: Split ePBS payload separation from trustless payments into separate EIPs
Ansgar supports split; most client support was for scalability, not trustless payments

process_and_governance.highlight: Non-headliner EIP deadline: one week after Fusaka mainnet date is set
Primary point of contact requirement simplified for CFI'd EIPs
EIP-7870 (hardware requirements) moved from Review to Live status

organizational.highlight: ePBS breakout scheduled next Friday; decision on headliner split in 2 weeks
H-star fork name to be finalized by Fusaka mainnet; "Etios" currently leading poll

action_items.action: Document trade-offs for ePBS payload separation vs trustless payments split
Discuss ePBS trustless payments separation at breakout; stakeholders join

decisions.decision: ePBS trustless payments split decision deferred; will decide in 2 weeks
Non-headliner EIP proposals close one week after Fusaka mainnet date set
EIP-7870 (minimum hardware requirements) approved to move to Live status

targets.target: October 10 - ePBS breakout call to discuss trustless payments
October 16 - ACDC decision on ePBS headliner split
